chapter.title: Explanation of Passive/Active Methods
chapter.para: Because nemo-python is an interface to a Nemo' extension interface rather than a true library, it is rather quirky in how it works. One example of this is that several providers have additional public methods that an extension actively calls, rather than the extension defining and the method in their class that is called by Nemo. You can see this with the Nemo.menu_provider_emit_items_updated_signal and Nemo.info_provider_update_complete_invoke methods, which the extension actively calls, passing the provider instance as a parameter.
Due to this confusion, I have termed these actively-called methods Active Methods and the methods called by Nemo are termed Passive Methods.
